response.overview: 26. James Bond movie brings new cars, new characters, new fights and a new Bond!!! Bud Spencer as the main character goes to Napoli to meet somebody called "Even Angels eat beans". This man (as turned out itÂ´s a women...) tellls him someone wants to kill M (Voldemort).
